definition: to extend/to state/to explain/9th earthly branch: 3-5 p.m., 7th solar month (7th August-7th September), year of the Monkey/ancient Chinese compass point: 240°
old name for Shanghai 上海[Shang4 hai3]/surname Shen
to speak/to say/to explain/to scold/to tell off/a theory (typically the last character in a compound, as in 日心說|日心说 heliocentric theory)

sentences.english: The face of rape, not shrink Vinci, he continued to prepare the complaint, Tom.
sentences.chinese: 面对霸道，芬奇绝不畏缩，他预备继承为汤姆申说。

sentences.english: This essay tries to give an objective comment on this issue.
sentences.chinese: 本文试图对这一切给以客观的申说。

definition: to elucidate/to expound/to study and explain
to study/to examine/to probe/to study the underlying principles

definition: Liu Xiang (77-6 BC), Han Dynasty scholar and author
appearing to be praising others while actually praising yourself/one's criticism of others exposes one's own faults
(literary) to remonstrate with one's superior tactfully
drumming on a bowl in grief (idiom, refers to Zhuangzi 莊子|庄子 grieving for his lost wife)/fig. grief for a lost wife
